feedback-info-p: Join our innovative and collaborative team! We are always looking for talented individuals ready to make a difference. Upload resume and start your journey with us.
address: Andijon Region, Andijon City, Istiqlol Street, House 30, Apartment 17
service-title1: Turnkey construction of solar power plants for commercial and industrial facilities
service-title2: Design, Feasibility Study and System Management for Renewable Energy Facilities
service-title4: Technical inspection and audit of renewable energy facilities
service1-desc1: Development of project concept and adaptation of technical documentation
service1-desc2: Supply of equipment and installation materialsbr
service1-desc3: Organization of construction and installation work
service1-desc5: Final commissioning and handover of the facility
service2-desc2: Development of system-level management models for energy projects
service2-desc3: Drafting of technical and regulatory project documentation
service3-desc1: Digital modeling in DIgSILENT PowerFactory environment
service3-desc2: Comprehensive simulation of 110kV, 220kV, and 500kV electrical networks
service4-desc1: On-site assessment of cabling, transformers, and electrical panels
service4-desc2: Thermal imaging diagnostics of solar panels, transmission lines, and wind turbine blades using drones
service4-desc3: Preparation of a detailed report including detected issues and recommendations
aboutinformation-card1: 1. Design & Engineering – full engineering documentation for solar power plants and electrical infrastructure 2. Grid Connection Solutions – secure integration into national and local power 3. Protection & Stability Systems – maintaining grid balance using RAS and WAMS/WACS technologies 4. Integration of Solar and Wind Sources – seamless connection of renewables into power systems 5. Site Assessment – solar and wind resource analysis, feasibility studies 6. Turnkey EPC Projects – complete construction and delivery of PV power plants 7. Technical Consulting – strategic and engineering advisory for public and private clients
aboutinformation-card2: 1. Direct involvement in projects with a total installed capacity exceeding 500 MW 2. Successfully completed tracker system installation at the 250 MW Nur Bukhara Solar Power Plant located in Olot District, Bukhara region 3. Eective collaboration with leading international and regional companies, including U Energy (South Korea), Baihai Solar, and Power Sun 4. Skilled in-house team for PV module installation, tracker assembly, electrical connections, geodetic surveying, and HSE compliance 5. Proven experience in modernizing schools, industrial, and social infrastructurefacilities using solar energy co-friendly materials, and construction techniques that minimize environmental impact.
andijan-warehouse: Andijan – more than 0.5 MW of PV panels
tashkemt-warehosue: Tashkent – more than 1 MW of PV panels
certificares-info: We proudly hold locally and internationally recognized certifications and licenses that validate our commitment to excellence, safety, and sustainability.
